channel.title: Help with this script
channel.description:
i can't get it to work at all can some1 show me how i would make this work??
[scar]{=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=**=*=*=*=*=*=*=*] Auto Mind Buyer v 1.0 By killer kure
Thanks too Akuma,Weibs, and other people who aren't cool enough to make it on my thank you list
[*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*} program MindBuyer; const runecolor=666; // set the color of rune const runebuyingtime=666; // how fast you want to buy var mindrune,x,y:integer; begin mindrune := BitmapFromString(49, 59, 'z78DAED9A6B8EDB300C8' + '4AF64BDA59F921FF73F52550D0B50A51578B748EC45C50588C04B' + '24F687E19076B22C3366CC983163C68C193366CC784AD8687663A' + 'C379BD1F4FA7D39D9C5D877E4B753021F9E7F20AB8F527A379F49' + '4972F80F281D359685E7D1557FAF525EA97C9F51E51328F12B6D2' + '50A5912F897CAAE8651E2EFC3F333B544E726AE941FEF8E08558C' + 'AE97531A1DF989BE2495F0BAE3B24B314554E69CF6B4E52DABDCD' + '5149B6BA0A6A47CE4E37BBDF6044A433E2F35C359E5984A2AB9E4' + '255512D964CD6B8AC9B5A2F8FAFF5242DEF376D2B98F776F760E8' + 'ABF963D5215A353D54B32A9EB44A20445213762BCA6E8ECB387BA' + 'C0AA94A2CA72BD073F44E9329F98C31EB678C45ADC515AD3120FB' + '0EA2899E493EFD4E5534EB9AB691AE39D0856BCC62CBAFEDD46E9' + 'C264E739BA504289252EE1482ABAE8640D58E1EAB6123665903BE' + 'F6AF4885273AD5229E66E1F805F5D99741FA5F4F7E70E2754DCA2' + '8E2A99186248B60A24C99A94E31E374E89D3233E2AD58F43460D8' + '8F11ACE6AA4A87B29F9C3D708CEAF7E0D6BD041C518B63F1DD711' + '60C428876ACCB9AB69DC28B30EE5359C15751FBC9DB1BA8DD2F9E' + '7AADF4DE18EA07CF431E4B0F823AA50435E1732E8A113891BA7D7' + 'B8514E718DA563086E2DC3BBE0F3E844B0EA14C5CEFCF3947026E' + 'EA8171A4F28C1975A1EB26AFD886C569317C7F34875E046B9E98D' + 'FAB14D4962C5B605B103DF412939ED9457AE9E9CDFBCF33644BFF' + 'B3D1CA176201445D9841412A727C9C87C49759C15D4854E6C5B16' + 'B16A33FAED9406BD469482DBDD4EEED4B40477AADE6483A1CCB89' + 'DD0003DB859DB22BAFFB65949DA6BDC4EE8811BF631B062DB29BA' + 'EF364AC51967BC75AB5B494BF07064E80ADC5AE6D70E6EC844A3E' + '98D733B6125881125E80A94B071B139F8214A62C6919257EBAD27' + '564D51E44EA6AEC95912EB2831BD1107A6344E8C8E30A549973BE' + '9BEE654B751E2F76BD91A6BDCE66A80D2C8ABC1AAA3F4C5DE244A' + '8C15E90A8A829F63F63D8D92ABAF779A7470A7D67794E1544C5D1' + 'D25DE8F60C589B14EE4EA920E46BB2BDBAF709FC89F39DC4C49D7' + 'D9B13A658B2D7C2BF0C56BAF24AB8E92F4AEAFB2628AE2FB27516' + 'A8A7A02A57AE675E0D8DD56D1D33E004549568CD8092B416CE4F3' + 'DD5E014581129F718FA1D4B14AD5BC1DB1C2BC437E49ECCABE74E' + '25D602514D56D9B4D579CCF232879A38DAE93AF2E28A4284E49B8' + 'FAEB4E1CF563B7B70B45C96D53DEF9DE45A96365F4A10F1BACB27' + 'FEE5C1AB1D1D41B79176D117C9718B0EAEE74D89E2955F4214A2F' + 'BF3BEB28C1CF1925C9AAEBC1112BB977719F6FDD478A12BBC1E8F' + '9C94777EFD7AC945EF54A1B42DBA33A62575C6BA42B41497AD448' + '4537501AB0C219EA5DD731038F829F13AB1131C6AA732D490C8A6' + '2F73BD2D56F7E0AF7FA1B8A012B9A7D702A6B37BB81D288D56BD7' + '3AD158E3C69F588E54F4084A825877E6AD0769B36A9D481A634F5' + 'D38BD1386E84AD19B92CCCDDF0E7C911232DB5254B7333487072B' + '9E6987F76EB13B18D21D229B02D795F3684A03D792C4BE97AF2BE' + '70750BAA0B17FC90FFD65CE3B7EC5F7C1DF0A7E86D28C193366CC' + '983163C68C193366CC98F1B3E217D1ED7621'); If(Findbitmap(mindrune, x, y))Then Begin findcolorspiral(x,y,runecolor,3,3,515,336) mmouse(x,y,3,3) istextat2(9,9,'Buy 5',20) mouse(x,y,2,2,true) wait(runebuyingtime+random(300)) repeat until (false) end.[/scar]

item.title: Help with this script
item.dc:creator: @hey321 hey321
item.description:
@hey321 wrote:

[quote=“Starblaster100, post:27, topic:29171”][php]
{=========================**=======*]
Auto Mind Buyer
v 1.0
By killer kure

Thanks too Akuma,Weibs, and other people who aren’t cool
enough to make it on my thank you list

[================================*}
program MindBuyer;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}

const
runecolor=666; // set the color of rune
runebuyingtime=666; // how fast you want to buy

var
MindRune : Integer;

begin
SetupSRL;
MindRune := BitmapFromString(49, 59, ‘z78DAED9A6B8EDB300C8’ +
‘4AF64BDA59F921FF73F52550D0B50A51578B748EC45C50588C04B’ +
‘24F687E19076B22C3366CC983163C68C193366CC784AD8687663A’ +
‘C379BD1F4FA7D39D9C5D877E4B753021F9E7F20AB8F527A379F49’ +
‘4972F80F281D359685E7D1557FAF525EA97C9F51E51328F12B6D2’ +
‘50A5912F897CAAE8651E2EFC3F333B544E726AE941FEF8E08558C’ +
‘AE97531A1DF989BE2495F0BAE3B24B314554E69CF6B4E52DABDCD’ +
‘5149B6BA0A6A47CE4E37BBDF6044A433E2F35C359E5984A2AB9E4’ +
‘255512D964CD6B8AC9B5A2F8FAFF5242DEF376D2B98F776F760E8’ +
‘ABF963D5215A353D54B32A9EB44A20445213762BCA6E8ECB387BA’ +
‘C0AA94A2CA72BD073F44E9329F98C31EB678C45ADC515AD3120FB’ +
‘0EA2899E493EFD4E5534EB9AB691AE39D0856BCC62CBAFEDD46E9’ +
‘C264E739BA504289252EE1482ABAE8640D58E1EAB6123665903BE’ +
‘F6AF4885273AD5229E66E1F805F5D99741FA5F4F7E70E2754DCA2’ +
‘8E2A99186248B60A24C99A94E31E374E89D3233E2AD58F43460D8’ +
‘8F11ACE6AA4A87B29F9C3D708CEAF7E0D6BD041C518B63F1DD711’ +
‘60C428876ACCB9AB69DC28B30EE5359C15751FBC9DB1BA8DD2F9E’ +
‘7AADF4DE18EA07CF431E4B0F823AA50435E1732E8A113891BA7D7’ +
‘B8514E718DA563086E2DC3BBE0F3E844B0EA14C5CEFCF3947026E’ +
‘EA8171A4F28C1975A1EB26AFD886C569317C7F34875E046B9E98D’ +
‘FAB14D4962C5B605B103DF412939ED9457AE9E9CDFBCF33644BFF’ +
‘B3D1CA176201445D9841412A727C9C87C49759C15D4854E6C5B16’ +
‘B16A33FAED9406BD469482DBDD4EEED4B40477AADE6483A1CCB89’ +
‘DD0003DB859DB22BAFFB65949DA6BDC4EE8811BF631B062DB29BA’ +
‘EF364AC51967BC75AB5B494BF07064E80ADC5AE6D70E6EC844A3E’ +
‘98D733B6125881125E80A94B071B139F8214A62C6919257EBAD27’ +
‘564D51E44EA6AEC95912EB2831BD1107A6344E8C8E30A549973BE’ +
‘9BEE654B751E2F76BD91A6BDCE66A80D2C8ABC1AAA3F4C5DE244A’ +
‘8C15E90A8A829F63F63D8D92ABAF779A7470A7D67794E1544C5D1’ +
‘D25DE8F60C589B14EE4EA920E46BB2BDBAF709FC89F39DC4C49D7’ +
‘D9B13A658B2D7C2BF0C56BAF24AB8E92F4AEAFB2628AE2FB27516’ +
‘A8A7A02A57AE675E0D8DD56D1D33E004549568CD8092B416CE4F3’ +
‘DD5E014581129F718FA1D4B14AD5BC1DB1C2BC437E49ECCABE74E’ +
‘25D602514D56D9B4D579CCF232879A38DAE93AF2E28A4284E49B8’ +
‘FAEB4E1CF563B7B70B45C96D53DEF9DE45A96365F4A10F1BACB27’ +
‘FEE5C1AB1D1D41B79176D117C9718B0EAEE74D89E2955F4214A2F’ +
‘BF3BEB28C1CF1925C9AAEBC1112BB977719F6FDD478A12BBC1E8F’ +
‘9C94777EFD7AC945EF54A1B42DBA33A62575C6BA42B41497AD448’ +
‘4537501AB0C219EA5DD731038F829F13AB1131C6AA732D490C8A6’ +
‘2F73BD2D56F7E0AF7FA1B8A012B9A7D702A6B37BB81D288D56BD7’ +
‘3AD158E3C69F588E54F4084A825877E6AD0769B36A9D481A634F5’ +
‘D38BD1386E84AD19B92CCCDDF0E7C911232DB5254B7333487072B’ +
‘9E6987F76EB13B18D21D229B02D795F3684A03D792C4BE97AF2BE’ +
‘70750BAA0B17FC90FFD65CE3B7EC5F7C1DF0A7E86D28C193366CC’ +
‘983163C68C193366CC98F1B3E217D1ED7621’);
Repeat
If(Findbitmap(mindrune, x, y))Then
Begin
If(FindColorSpiral(x, y, runecolor, 3, 3, 515, 336)then
Begin
MMouse(x, y, 3, 3);
Mouse(x, y, 3, 3, False);
If(IsTextAt2(9, 9, ‘Buy 5’, 20)then
Begin
Mouse(x, y, 2, 2, True)
wait(RuneBuyingTime + Random(300))
end;
end;
end;
until(False)
end.
[/php]

It is good practise to write scar script with standards as well

No more flaming in this topic.[/quote]

Good job Star. Now only thing you need Killer Kure is to put Mouse where i put it in by

[php]
MMouse(x, y, 3, 3)
If(IsTextAt2(9, 9, ‘Buy 5’, 20)then
[/php]

In between those ;). It should work after that.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with this script
item.dc:creator: @Starblaster100 Starblaster100
item.description:
@Starblaster100 wrote:

[php]
{=========================**=======*]
Auto Mind Buyer
v 1.0
By killer kure

Thanks too Akuma,Weibs, and other people who aren’t cool
enough to make it on my thank you list

[================================*}
program MindBuyer;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}

const
runecolor=666; // set the color of rune
runebuyingtime=666; // how fast you want to buy

var
MindRune : Integer;

begin
SetupSRL;
MindRune := BitmapFromString(49, 59, ‘z78DAED9A6B8EDB300C8’ +
‘4AF64BDA59F921FF73F52550D0B50A51578B748EC45C50588C04B’ +
‘24F687E19076B22C3366CC983163C68C193366CC784AD8687663A’ +
‘C379BD1F4FA7D39D9C5D877E4B753021F9E7F20AB8F527A379F49’ +
‘4972F80F281D359685E7D1557FAF525EA97C9F51E51328F12B6D2’ +
‘50A5912F897CAAE8651E2EFC3F333B544E726AE941FEF8E08558C’ +
‘AE97531A1DF989BE2495F0BAE3B24B314554E69CF6B4E52DABDCD’ +
‘5149B6BA0A6A47CE4E37BBDF6044A433E2F35C359E5984A2AB9E4’ +
‘255512D964CD6B8AC9B5A2F8FAFF5242DEF376D2B98F776F760E8’ +
‘ABF963D5215A353D54B32A9EB44A20445213762BCA6E8ECB387BA’ +
‘C0AA94A2CA72BD073F44E9329F98C31EB678C45ADC515AD3120FB’ +
‘0EA2899E493EFD4E5534EB9AB691AE39D0856BCC62CBAFEDD46E9’ +
‘C264E739BA504289252EE1482ABAE8640D58E1EAB6123665903BE’ +
‘F6AF4885273AD5229E66E1F805F5D99741FA5F4F7E70E2754DCA2’ +
‘8E2A99186248B60A24C99A94E31E374E89D3233E2AD58F43460D8’ +
‘8F11ACE6AA4A87B29F9C3D708CEAF7E0D6BD041C518B63F1DD711’ +
‘60C428876ACCB9AB69DC28B30EE5359C15751FBC9DB1BA8DD2F9E’ +
‘7AADF4DE18EA07CF431E4B0F823AA50435E1732E8A113891BA7D7’ +
‘B8514E718DA563086E2DC3BBE0F3E844B0EA14C5CEFCF3947026E’ +
‘EA8171A4F28C1975A1EB26AFD886C569317C7F34875E046B9E98D’ +
‘FAB14D4962C5B605B103DF412939ED9457AE9E9CDFBCF33644BFF’ +
‘B3D1CA176201445D9841412A727C9C87C49759C15D4854E6C5B16’ +
‘B16A33FAED9406BD469482DBDD4EEED4B40477AADE6483A1CCB89’ +
‘DD0003DB859DB22BAFFB65949DA6BDC4EE8811BF631B062DB29BA’ +
‘EF364AC51967BC75AB5B494BF07064E80ADC5AE6D70E6EC844A3E’ +
‘98D733B6125881125E80A94B071B139F8214A62C6919257EBAD27’ +
‘564D51E44EA6AEC95912EB2831BD1107A6344E8C8E30A549973BE’ +
‘9BEE654B751E2F76BD91A6BDCE66A80D2C8ABC1AAA3F4C5DE244A’ +
‘8C15E90A8A829F63F63D8D92ABAF779A7470A7D67794E1544C5D1’ +
‘D25DE8F60C589B14EE4EA920E46BB2BDBAF709FC89F39DC4C49D7’ +
‘D9B13A658B2D7C2BF0C56BAF24AB8E92F4AEAFB2628AE2FB27516’ +
‘A8A7A02A57AE675E0D8DD56D1D33E004549568CD8092B416CE4F3’ +
‘DD5E014581129F718FA1D4B14AD5BC1DB1C2BC437E49ECCABE74E’ +
‘25D602514D56D9B4D579CCF232879A38DAE93AF2E28A4284E49B8’ +
‘FAEB4E1CF563B7B70B45C96D53DEF9DE45A96365F4A10F1BACB27’ +
‘FEE5C1AB1D1D41B79176D117C9718B0EAEE74D89E2955F4214A2F’ +
‘BF3BEB28C1CF1925C9AAEBC1112BB977719F6FDD478A12BBC1E8F’ +
‘9C94777EFD7AC945EF54A1B42DBA33A62575C6BA42B41497AD448’ +
‘4537501AB0C219EA5DD731038F829F13AB1131C6AA732D490C8A6’ +
‘2F73BD2D56F7E0AF7FA1B8A012B9A7D702A6B37BB81D288D56BD7’ +
‘3AD158E3C69F588E54F4084A825877E6AD0769B36A9D481A634F5’ +
‘D38BD1386E84AD19B92CCCDDF0E7C911232DB5254B7333487072B’ +
‘9E6987F76EB13B18D21D229B02D795F3684A03D792C4BE97AF2BE’ +
‘70750BAA0B17FC90FFD65CE3B7EC5F7C1DF0A7E86D28C193366CC’ +
‘983163C68C193366CC98F1B3E217D1ED7621’);
Repeat
If(Findbitmap(mindrune, x, y))Then
Begin
If(FindColorSpiral(x, y, runecolor, 3, 3, 515, 336)then
Begin
MMouse(x, y, 3, 3)
If(IsTextAt2(9, 9, ‘Buy 5’, 20)then
Begin
Mouse(x, y, 2, 2, True)
wait(RuneBuyingTime + Random(300))
end;
end;
end;
until(False)
end.
[/php]

It is good practise to write scar script with standards as well

No more flaming in this topic.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with this script
item.dc:creator: @N4TH4N N4TH4N
item.description:
@N4TH4N wrote:

[quote=“killer kure, post:12, topic:29171”]bullzeye it works but i get this error and it won’t repeat

[Runtime Error] : Exception: Access violation at address 0064FEA2 in module ‘scar.exe’. Read of address 00000000 in line 405 in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl\srl\core\Text.scar[/quote]

Add this to after your main ‘begin’ so that it looks like this,

“begin
ActivateClient;
SetupSRL;”

Read full topic

item.title: Help with this script
item.dc:creator: @Scar Scar
item.description:
@Scar wrote:

[quote=“killer kure, post:24, topic:29171”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=42943.msg533780#msg533780 date=1164604995]

oo don’t wet your panties un-named i need help and your bitchen ain’t doin to much

No, you want some fucker to fix your pathetic script so you can get auto on your main and bitch to us wehn you get banned. Lets take a look at your script shall we?

Un-needed bitmaps and a shitty buy procedure. You do know if it doesn’t find the text “Buy 5” then it will carry on, you didn’t even BOTHER to BUY the rune, wtf, you only click the rune.

findcolorspiral(x,y,runecolor,3,3,515,336)
mmouse(x,y,3,3)
istextat2(9,9,‘Buy 5’,20)
mouse(x,y,2,2,true)
wait(runebuyingtime+random(300))

To buy a rune you need to right click it and click “Buy 5”, tell me, where the hell did you right click?
[/quote]

shun on u i thought u had more self control to yell at a poor defenseless noob like me lol i can’t believe i got u so pissed hahaha[/quote]

haha you call yourself a poor defenseless noob?lololol thats funny…

Read full topic

item.title: Help with this script
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

item.title: Help with this script
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

Try this: [scar]{=========================**=======*]
Auto Mind Buyer
v 1.0
By killer kure

Thanks too Akuma,Weibs, and other people who aren’t cool
enough to make it on my thank you list

[================================*}
program MindBuyer;
{.include srl/srl.scar}
const runebuyingtime=666; // how fast you want to buy
var
mindrune:integer;
begin
mindrune := BitmapFromString(12, 8, ‘z78DA9D90310EC4200C04B’ +
‘F0409B0EBD210F8FF9382620A22DF5D71204D63180D10E8B8280C’ +
‘188B9507232F269E491383182510841C9C4B32952A858D55744E0’ +
‘60B1A1AFFB39987ECF3DC09852E6ECEFDAED9160733F3B259D5E3’ +
‘D9CF7BBE3AB7425F858182F2C1E00A7BA0C666F455A83871E0429’ +
‘AFB7132CE21177FDA8CF6CF1044046F7B399D6DBDD1AAAC076594’ +
‘FECDF66AF39EEDAF6E53808000’);
Begin
if(FindBitMapTol(x, y, mindrune, 0, 0, 1000, 1000))then
repeat
mouse(x,y,3,3,false)
clickoption(‘5’, 1);
wait(runebuyingtime+random(300))
until(false)
else
writeln(‘not found’);
repeat
until(false)
end;
end.
[/scar]

Read full topic

item.title: Help with this script
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

[scar]{=========================**=======*]
Auto Mind Buyer
v 1.0
By killer kure

Thanks too Akuma,Weibs, and other people who aren’t cool
enough to make it on my thank you list

[================================*}
program MindBuyer;
{.include srl/srl.scar}
const runecolor=666; // set the color of rune
const runebuyingtime=666; // how fast you want to buy
var
mindrune:integer;
begin
mindrune := BitmapFromString(49, 59, ‘z78DAED9A6B8EDB300C8’ +
‘4AF64BDA59F921FF73F52550D0B50A51578B748EC45C50588C04B’ +
‘24F687E19076B22C3366CC983163C68C193366CC784AD8687663A’ +

‘0EA2899E493EFD4E5534EB9AB691AE39D0856BCC62CBAFEDD46E9’ +

‘EA8171A4F28C1975A1EB26AFD886C569317C7F34875E046B9E98D’ +

‘B3D1CA176201445D9841412A727C9C87C49759C15D4854E6C5B16’ +
‘B16A33FAED9406BD469482DBDD4EEED4B40477AADE6483A1CCB89’ +
‘DD0003DB859DB22BAFFB65949DA6BDC4EE8811BF631B062DB29BA’ +
‘EF364AC51967BC75AB5B494BF07064E80ADC5AE6D70E6EC844A3E’ +
‘98D733B6125881125E80A94B071B139F8214A62C6919257EBAD27’ +
‘564D51E44EA6AEC95912EB2831BD1107A6344E8C8E30A549973BE’ +
‘9BEE654B751E2F76BD91A6BDCE66A80D2C8ABC1AAA3F4C5DE244A’ +
‘8C15E90A8A829F63F63D8D92ABAF779A7470A7D67794E1544C5D1’ +
‘D25DE8F60C589B14EE4EA920E46BB2BDBAF709FC89F39DC4C49D7’ +
‘D9B13A658B2D7C2BF0C56BAF24AB8E92F4AEAFB2628AE2FB27516’ +
‘A8A7A02A57AE675E0D8DD56D1D33E004549568CD8092B416CE4F3’ +
‘DD5E014581129F718FA1D4B14AD5BC1DB1C2BC437E49ECCABE74E’ +
‘25D602514D56D9B4D579CCF232879A38DAE93AF2E28A4284E49B8’ +
‘FAEB4E1CF563B7B70B45C96D53DEF9DE45A96365F4A10F1BACB27’ +
‘FEE5C1AB1D1D41B79176D117C9718B0EAEE74D89E2955F4214A2F’ +
‘BF3BEB28C1CF1925C9AAEBC1112BB977719F6FDD478A12BBC1E8F’ +
‘9C94777EFD7AC945EF54A1B42DBA33A62575C6BA42B41497AD448’ +
‘4537501AB0C219EA5DD731038F829F13AB1131C6AA732D490C8A6’ +
‘2F73BD2D56F7E0AF7FA1B8A012B9A7D702A6B37BB81D288D56BD7’ +
‘3AD158E3C69F588E54F4084A825877E6AD0769B36A9D481A634F5’ +
‘D38BD1386E84AD19B92CCCDDF0E7C911232DB5254B7333487072B’ +
‘9E6987F76EB13B18D21D229B02D795F3684A03D792C4BE97AF2BE’ +
‘70750BAA0B17FC90FFD65CE3B7EC5F7C1DF0A7E86D28C193366CC’ +
‘983163C68C193366CC98F1B3E217D1ED7621’);
If(Findbitmap(mindrune, x, y))Then
Begin
findcolorspiral(x,y,runecolor,3,3,515,336)
mmouse(x,y,3,3)
istextat2(9,9,‘Buy 5’,20)
mouse(x,y,2,2,true)
wait(runebuyingtime+random(300))
repeat
until(false)
end;
end.
[/scar] You had some more errors that I fixed.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with this script
item.dc:creator: @killer_kure killer kure
item.description:
@killer_kure wrote:

[quote=“JukuG, post:7, topic:29171”]killer kure’s error is:

Failed when compiling Line 64: [Error] (64:1): Unknown identifier 'mmouse' in script

You are using SRL, this means that you have to add:{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
right under:

program MindBuyer;

tyvm i was confused as to what the first poster was asking and why he was talking about the debug box i posted the link in which people could see the problems for themselves but ty JukuG[br][size=1]Posted at: November 25, 2006, 04:24:51 PM[/size][hr]i included the srl and now it is saying this

Line 15: [Error] (14465:10): Duplicate identifier ‘x’ in script C:Program FilesSCAR 2.03ScriptsMy Mind buyer 4 rizzle.scar

Line 15: [Error] (14465:10): Duplicate identifier ‘y’ in script C:Program FilesSCAR 2.03ScriptsMy Mind buyer 4 rizzle.scar

Read full topic
